SEARCH
Package com.kivojenko.spring.forge.annotation.endpoint

Annotation Interface WithEndpoints

@Target(FIELD) @Retention(SOURCE) public @interface WithEndpoints
Configures generation of multiple endpoints for a collection association field.

  • Optional Element Summary

    Optional Elements
    Modifier and Type
    Optional Element
    Description
    boolean
    add
    Whether to generate a POST endpoint for this association.
    String
    getMethodName
    The name of the getter method in the service to use for this association.
    String
    path
    The custom path for the endpoints.
    boolean
    read
    Whether to generate a GET endpoint for this association.
    boolean
    remove
    Whether to generate a DELETE endpoint for this association.

  • Element Details

    • path

      String path
      The custom path for the endpoints. If empty, the field name will be used as the path.
      Default:
      ""

    • getMethodName

      String getMethodName
      The name of the getter method in the service to use for this association. If empty, a default "get" + FieldName will be used.
      Default:
      ""

    • read

      boolean read
      Whether to generate a GET endpoint for this association.
      Default:
      true

    • add

      boolean add
      Whether to generate a POST endpoint for this association.
      Default:
      false

    • remove

      boolean remove
      Whether to generate a DELETE endpoint for this association.
      Default:
      false
